title: The health benefits of apples
description: Could 'an apple a day keep the doctor away'?

vocabItems.definition: short sentence or expression giving some well-known, traditional advice or common sense
exoticunusual and exciting, often because it comes from a faraway place
keep a healthy body weight with no extra fat around the waist
able to be used for many purposes, or in many different ways
in a good state of health; in a good condition
